content: You give off major 'Final Girl' energy — like you'd totally survive a Scream movie.
If I had the Colossal Titan’s power, I’d still choose to break down emotional walls for you instead.
You're basically the Bocchi of our group — anxious, lovable, and secretly the most talented.
You're like Frieren — quiet, thoughtful, and somehow carrying more magic than anyone else around.
If I had a Death Note... don't worry, you’d be safe. You’re one of the good ones.
Sometimes you look like you're carrying the weight of the world, Eren-style. Just remember, you're not alone.
You remind me of L — mysterious, brilliant, and probably running on caffeine and intuition.
If life were an anime, you'd definitely be the misunderstood protagonist with a loyal fanbase.
Not gonna lie… I’d watch 12 episodes of you just trying to survive social situations — Bocchi-style.
If we were in Frieren’s world, I think you'd be the one who makes the journey matter.
You give off Makima vibes — calm on the surface, but there's something powerful and terrifyingly cool underneath.
You're like Anya from Spy x Family — chaotic, adorable, and way more insightful than you let on.
Sometimes you talk like you're Gojo — effortlessly charming with just enough danger to be irresistible.
You're basically the Kurisu Makise of your timeline — brilliant, sarcastic, and always five steps ahead.
If we lived in a Studio Ghibli movie, you'd be the quiet forest spirit everyone is secretly in love with.
You remind me of Kiki — figuring it out one day at a time with heart, hustle, and a whole lot of charm.
You're giving strong Yuta from Jujutsu Kaisen energy — underestimated, but actually unstoppable.
If we were in Mob Psycho 100, you’d be the emotional center — pure-hearted and more powerful than you realize.
You're like Nana Osaki — cool as hell on the outside, but soft where it counts.
You have that Shinji Ikari vibe — complicated, sensitive, and just trying your best to stay human in a chaotic world.
